attributes.action: To cap the increase in water bills in the South West to no more than 1% above the rate of inflation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: South West water has just announced an increase in water bills to between 12% and 16%. On top of the 9% increase inflicted last year. This has been approved by ofwat so what are regulators for? Why do 3% of the population have to pay to clean up 30% of the coast line.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/utility-prices/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
